column1: Led by senior Aboriginal women, the Uti Kulintjaku Project took an innovative approach to developing a process to strengthen shared understandings of mental_health between Aboriginal people and nonAboriginal health professionals with the longterm aims of increasing helpseeking, strengthening health services cultural competency, and Aboriginal leadership.
